## What was done ?

### Development environment setup

I setup a basic development environment including a project repository (see [github](https://github.com/madeinshinea/304.2-medical-data-science){target="_blank"})

This includes:

 - a basic [README file](https://github.com/MadeInShineA/304.2-medical-data-science/blob/main/README.md){target="_blank"}, 
 - a small [project website](https://olivier.amacker.dev/304.2-medical-data-science/){target="_blank"}  made with [quarto](https://quarto.org/){target="_blank"}
deployed to a [github page](https://docs.github.com/en/pages){target="_blank"}
through a [github action](https://github.com/features/actions) (see [action](https://github.com/MadeInShineA/304.2-medical-data-science/blob/main/.github/workflows/deploy_website.yml){target="_blank"})

I also convinced my classmates to use github policies as follow:

 - Each feature must be developed on a separate branch
 - A pull request needs to be made to evaluate a feature
 - The feature pull requests need to be verified by at least 2 other individuals, including 1 from another team

### Collaborative environment setup

I convinced my fellow colleagues to use [Jira](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira){target="_blank"}. This decision was motivated
by the fact that's it's an industry standard.

We also setup the according teams, with specific filters to help people quickly what task they need to do
